meanings.definition: A substance that is thick and gooey.
meanings.sent1: She spread the gloopy jelly on her toast.
meanings.sent2: The chef poured the gloopy sauce over the pasta.
meanings.sent3: The gloopy slime oozed out of the container, surprising everyone.

meanings.sent5: The gloopy substance stuck to his fingers, making it hard to remove.
